feature_bullets: Perfect CompatibilityThis case is compatible with Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Lite 8.7 inch Model (SM-T220/T225/T227) 2021 Release. It will NOT work for any other model device
Slim & LightweightSuper slim and lightweight hard back design adds minimal bulk while offers your device great protection
Trifold StandThe Samsung Tab A7 Lite Case has flip capability to transform the case into a viewing stand and keyboard stand
Premium MaterialDurable protective hardback with premium quality PU leather. Soft scratch-free microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection

Precise Cutouts Easy access to all the controls and features; Perfect cutouts for speakers, camera and other ports.  Kindly Note: The Galaxy Tab A7 Lite 2021 tablet itself doesn't have sleep/wake capabilities so that there is no case offering this feature

tag_title: Fintie Slim Case for Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Lite 8.7 Inch 2021 Model (SM-T220/T225/T227), Ultra Thin Lightweight Hard Back Shell Tri-Fold Stand Cover, Black

reviews.title: Perfect for the price
reviews.content: Was an exact fit for my Tab A7 Lite. I'm rating this overall 5 stars because it exactly matches my intended use case. For basic or general use this case is perfect. It is not a super rugged case and definitely not what I would recommend o someone that uses their tablet for something like construction or excavation environs. Outside of that, it's excellent for home or office use. My only complaint would be that the magnet used to hold the cover closed or to fold into a stand, wasn't also used to hold the cover in the open position as well, that's trivial though and is pretty standard of every tablet case I've personally seen. Overall a great buy.

reviews.title: this is fun
reviews.content: I got this for my tablet to keep people out of it.  Is easy to hold but sometimes is slick.  Good quality and keeps my tablet safe and clean.

reviews.title: Pleased
reviews.content: I really like this cover.  The picture did not do it justice; it's nicer than I thought it would be.

reviews.title: Does It's Job
reviews.content: The product is exactly what I expected it to be (having owned the same basic item previously) except that I seriously thought it was blue.  Turns out it kind of a purple blue, but I don't care.  The design is the same and the product is the same, just an off shade.  No big deal.  The ONLY problem was, it was shipped, delayed, delayed again, and delayed again.  That might be an Amazon issue rather than a seller issue but it's still annoying.  It's here now though, obviously.

reviews.title: Great durability, sturdiness and easy to hold.
reviews.content: I purchased this cover for my mother who likes all things simple and this cover reminded her of her old (back in the day old) school writing tablets📓.  It fits her Samsung tablet perfectly. It works for her, it is easy to hold and she loves it.  Nothing more to say.👍🏽👍🏾👍🏽👍🏾👍🏽

reviews.title: A great budget case
reviews.content: This case is exactly what we were looking for. It fit the Galaxy Tab A7 perfectly, is light and not bulky.  Perfect for our needs.

reviews.title: Great cover
reviews.content: Provides protection for my Samsung tablet and looks good at the same time.

reviews.title: As expected
reviews.content: Fits nicely and is a great color.
